 Gamma function.
 )doc");
 
+REGISTER_OP("Zeta")
+    .Input("x: T")
+    .Input("q: T")
+    .Output("z: T")

body: Just realised that you use \\( latex code \\) for inline math. Shall I fix all the other documentation characters in the process and replace single \ with double \ in all tex-like docstrings? E.g. see line [122](https://github.com/tillahoffmann/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc#L122) in the same file.
